definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Enemy agents plotted to blow up the plant.
sentences.chinese: 敵人奸細密謀炸燬那家工廠。

sentences.english: All the camouflage of the spies cannot escape his sharp eyes.
sentences.chinese: 奸細所有的僞飾都逃不過他銳利的眼睛。

sentences.english: Judas wearing black cockscomb had hidden himself in the shaded volutes of an Ionic column.
sentences.chinese: 一個戴黑帽子的奸細站在愛奧尼柱渦卷的陰影中。

sentences.english: The spy wormed in the meeting-place.
Friend bin, misunderstanding spies is the beauty, and he split.
sentences.chinese: 朋琨誤解奸細是保美，與他分裂。

sentences.english: The spy wormed the true story out of a boy.
sentences.chinese: 奸細從一個男孩那裏套出了實情。

sentences.english: The enemy employed a red-hvastcasted siren as a spy.
sentences.chinese: 仇敵僱用了一名紅髮美女作奸細。

sentences.english: Don't tell him anything, he's a Yankee spy.
sentences.chinese: 什麼也不要告訴他，他是個北佬的奸細。

sentences.english: It never occurred to me that she was a spy.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有想到她是一名奸細。

definition: to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
villains collude together (idiom); to work hand in glove with sb (to nefarious ends)
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
to judge between right and wrong/to reason things out
to nod one's head and bow (idiom); bowing and scraping/unctuous fawning
